meanings.definition: A type of Scottish cap with a crease down the center and a ribbed ribbon hanging down the back.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers wore glengarries during the parade.
meanings.sent2: I bought two glengarries for my trip to Scotland.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear the glengarries as a tiny tent.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were hidden under the glengarries of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The colorful glengarries stood out in the crowd.
